welcome: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissor, Spock, Lizard!!
rules:
If you've never played before here's how it works. 
 => 1. Scissors cuts Paper covers Rock crushes Lizard. 
 => 2. Lizard poisons Spock smashes Scissors decapitates Lizard eats Paper. 
 => 3. Paper disproves Spock vaporizes Rock crushes Scissors.
